Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: With a teacher, they understand the context of the assignment, the writing requirements (ex. APA 7) and they may understand your level of expertise in the area and be able to give you more targeted nuanced feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Either way you're unlocking my blockers to get me faster to my goal of success but GenAI IS faster in response - and I mean you can ask AI at 1am a question and I don't want to impose that on teachers! :)

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI for example thought my degree in GDP was an economics term but Grad Dip in Psyche haha. So refining queries and ensuring the context of the request is clear and understood correctly with AI is super important and can sometimes be more tedious than just a quick email to your teacher. Pros and cons for both.
